name: Stout-Folk
description: Stout-Folk are smaller humanoids with sturdy builds and a strong connection to their homeworld of Kragfel, which they have long been forced to live beneath the surface. They are industrious, often excelling in mining, underground farming, and crafting. Stout-Folk communities are known for their hospitality and resilience, never turning away a stranger or outsider.

options.name: Stout-Folk Skin
options.description: The Stout-Folk have toughened skin that protects them against magic. Gain +1 Resistance and +3 Arcane Mitigation.

options.name: Reaction : Strong Chin
options.description: If you take Damage that would cause you to fall Unconcious, you can use your Reaction to delay it until the end of your next turn.

options.name: Stone Sense
options.description: Your deep connection to stone and earth allows you to sense your surroundings underground. You can detect hidden passages and structural weaknesses in stone within 10 Units.
